评论详情: The fit is a little different than expected - XL is also extra long, which happens to work well for me because I am actually tall. But these are the softest ever and are ACTUALLY 100% cashmere! While they look more like leggings in the photos, they are definitely looser like sweats in real life. I love them.

评论详情: These cashmere joggers are better than I had expected.  They're very soft but still substantial in weight.  While I like the pockets, I wonder if the shape would have been more streamlined without them.  The waistband is thick and tight, it may be because I should size up, but it's the only part of the pants that's slightly uncomfortable.  I'm torn, though, I think I prefer an aggressive waist to them not staying on properly.  Overall very satisfied and look forward to putting them to the ultimate test this upcoming New England winter.

Love, can't wait for cooler weather and will be ordering the top,also! I'm 5'6" 150#'s ordered the large,fits nice. Fast service/delivery,too! Thank you!👍
